Megatron/Quickstrike:







Megatron heard Black Arachnia's voice on his comm-link and 
replied: "Yes?"




Quickstrike:


Quickstrike stared up at the ceiling in his new quarters. It was the 
first personal quarters he'd had since he had been brought back on-
line. He had been on the run ever since, trying to advoid the others 
testy attitudes. He found an empty quarters in the ship and made it 
his. If anyone had anything to say about it, he was going to let them 
have it. He just wanted to lay down and sleep on an actual bunk and 
have an actual door. 

He closed his optics, watching the dark hit his vision. He listen to 
the slight hums that sounded in the ship, and a few voices that were 
muffled through the distance. 

When he did drift off to sleep, he dreamt of blackness and felt a 
slight chill against his temperature sensitive armor; but he wasn't 
sure. He just wanted to rest fully recharge.
